short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all children related words to minion

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your chrome the perfect chrome with Minionify.

What does it do? It replaces all uses of the word "children" with minion! 

What better extension could there be?

Help Children International - It connects you with an individual child who desperately needs your help, and lets you provide life-changing benefits to that child for a low monthly contribution. Sponsorship is your chance to build a lifelong friendship with a child in poverty, one that will alter the course of his or her life.

Learn more at https://children.org/ to help.

**This is just for fun, no harm to minions or their respectable owners was intended, not officially affiliated with children.org, just wanted to spread awareness.**
